definition: at the time or occasion immediately following, immediately following in time or order
details:
adverb
- at the time or occasion immediately following
= example: at the time or occasion immediately following
adjective
- immediately following in time or order
= synonyms: following
- nearest in space or position
= synonyms: adjacent, side by side
- (of elected officers) elected but not yet serving
= example: (of elected officers) elected but not yet serving
= synonyms: succeeding
